commitMessage:
feat(team-mode): add team mode detection and configuration service

Implements dynamic PM integration detection based on configuration and credentials.

## What Changed
- Created TeamModeService for mode detection logic
- Added PMConfiguration interface with enabled, queueOfflineRequests, statusMap, verbosity fields
- Updated StructureGenerator to create .hodge/.gitignore
- Implemented detectTeamMode() with full detection logic
- Added checkCredentials() for Linear and GitHub
- Added validateProviderConfig() for provider-specific validation
- 15 comprehensive smoke tests (all passing)

## Key Features
- pm.enabled flag controls team/solo mode
- Graceful degradation to queue mode when credentials missing
- Support for Linear and GitHub providers
- Type-safe JSON.parse with proper type guards
- Follows all mandatory standards (test isolation, TypeScript strict mode, error handling)

## Technical Details
- Detection logic: pm.enabled â†’ check credentials â†’ activate team mode or queue mode
- pm.enabled: false = hard override (ignore credentials)
- pm.enabled: undefined = solo mode (safe default)
- Unified config structure in hodge.json pm section
- .hodge/.gitignore created with context.json entry

## Quality Validation
- Tests: 1,343 passing (15 new smoke tests)
- Type Check: 0 errors
- Linting: 0 errors (12 acceptable warnings)
- Security: 0 issues
- All mandatory standards met

Related: HODGE-377 (Team Development epic)
